Digital identity and services delivery 🆔

May 25, 2022

  • civictech
  • government
  • digital services
  • technology
  • digital identity
  • cyber security
  • policy
  • services delivery

We are joined by Jordan Burris, Senior Director of Public Sector Product Market Strategy at Socure and former Chief of Staff at the US Office of Management and Budget to talk about digital identity and the impact it can have on the delivery of public services.
